text:
e="preserve">Dhanik Lal Mandal (born March 1932) is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha from Jhanjharpur in Bihar, twice in 1977 and 1980. He was the member of Bihar Legislative Assembly (1967–74) and also speaker of Bihar Legislative Assembly, (1967–69).
He was the Governor of Haryana from 1990 to 1995.
